title: Fix favicon asset + cross-browser favicon markup

requirements.summary: Ensure the 32x32 PNG favicon asset exists in the deployed static assets and is valid/non-empty.
acceptanceCriteria: The repository contains the file at frontend/public/assets/generated/subrin-favicon-uploaded.dim_32x32.png.
Requesting /assets/generated/subrin-favicon-uploaded.dim_32x32.png in a browser returns HTTP 200 with Content-Type image/png.
The browser tab shows the custom favicon instead of the default icon after a hard refresh.

file_operations.description: Add the required non-empty, valid PNG favicon asset at this exact path so it is served as a static file from the deployed frontend (per imageRequirements: Simplified favicon icon).

requirements.summary: Update favicon link markup in frontend/index.html for broad browser compatibility (icon + shortcut icon).
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/index.html contains a <link rel="icon" type="image/png" sizes="32x32" href="/assets/generated/subrin-favicon-uploaded.dim_32x32.png" /> entry.
frontend/index.html also contains a <link rel="shortcut icon" type="image/png" href="/assets/generated/subrin-favicon-uploaded.dim_32x32.png" /> entry.
After redeploy, the favicon appears in the browser tab when loading the site in a fresh/incognito window.

file_operations.description: Ensure there is a 32x32 PNG <link rel="icon" ...> pointing to /assets/generated/subrin-favicon-uploaded.dim_32x32.png and add a redundant <link rel="shortcut icon" type="image/png" href="/assets/generated/subrin-favicon-uploaded.dim_32x32.png" /> for compatibility, without changing unrelated page content.
